title: aarumO aaval
language:
Tamil

Pallavi

Arumo Aval Arumuganai nEril kANAdu 
(Arumo)

Anu
sahitya:
Erumayil Eri kunru tOrum ninrADiyavan
pErum pugazhum terindumavan pErazhagai paruhAmal 
(Arumo)

CaraNam

jnAna guruparan dInarkarul guhan vAnavarum tozhum Ananda
vaibhOgan
kANakkiDaikkumo kurudarkhillAmal arputa darisanam karpanai seidAl maTTum
(Arumo)
